mapper.insert: INSERT into address (member_id, name, address_basic, address_detail, zip_code, created_at, created_by, modified_at, modified_by, deleted) values (#{memberId}, #{name}, #{addressBasic}, #{addressDetail},#{zipCode}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedAt}, #{modifiedBy}, #{deleted})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member where (member_id = #{memberId} and name = #{name});
